properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Salamu mama maria,
wanao twakusalimu
(mama wa Yesu)
Salamu twakutolea.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Sisi wanao,
twazileta sala
za maombi yetu,
mama mwema utusikilize.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Tusaidie kuyashinda
majaribu ya dunia
utusimamie
wanawako.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Mwovu shetani,
tumshinde sisi
kwa maombi yetu
mama wa mokozi
tusike.
